video.label: Video
video.description: Convert, trim, compress, and edit videos

pdf.label: PDF
pdf.description: Merge, split, compress, protect, and edit PDFs

home.title: What do you want to do?
home.subtitle: Choose a tool to get started.
home.loadingFailed: Could not start the processing engine. Please restart the app.

upload.dropzone: Drag & drop your files here, or click to browse
upload.reorderHint: Drag or use arrows to reorder
upload.errorConnect: Could not connect to the API. Is the processor service running?

video-bg-remove.label: Remove Video Background
video-bg-remove.description: Remove the background from a video and export with transparency in WebP, GIF, MOV, or PNG.

image-bg-remove.label: Remove Image Background
image-bg-remove.description: Remove the background from a single image and export as PNG or WebP with transparency.

image-convert.label: Convert Image Format
image-convert.description: Convert an image to a different format with optional resizing and quality control.

video-convert.label: Convert Video Format
video-convert.description: Convert a video to a different format, codec, or resolution with full control over quality.

video-to-gif.label: Video to GIF
video-to-gif.description: Convert a video clip to an animated GIF with optimized colors and dithering.

image-compress.label: Compress Image
image-compress.description: Reduce image file size with quality, resize, and metadata stripping options.

video-trim.label: Trim Video
video-trim.description: Cut a segment from a video by selecting start time and duration. Supports fast copy or re-encoding.

audio-extract.label: Extract Audio
audio-extract.description: Extract the audio track from a video as MP3, AAC, WAV, FLAC, or OGG.

video-compress.label: Compress Video
video-compress.description: Reduce video file size with quality, resolution, and audio compression controls.

image-watermark.label: Image Watermark
image-watermark.description: Add a text watermark to an image with position, size, opacity, and color controls.

pdf-to-image.label: PDF to Image
pdf-to-image.description: Convert PDF pages to PNG, JPG, or WebP images. Multiple pages are exported as a ZIP.

video-thumbnail.label: Video Thumbnail
video-thumbnail.description: Extract a single frame from a video at a specific time as a PNG, JPG, or WebP image.

pdf-merge.label: Merge PDFs
pdf-merge.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document.

pdf-split.label: Split PDF
pdf-split.description: Extract specific pages or split a PDF into separate files.

pdf-compress.label: Compress PDF
pdf-compress.description: Reduce PDF file size by compressing content and images.

pdf-rotate.label: Rotate PDF
pdf-rotate.description: Rotate all or specific pages of a PDF by 90, 180, or 270 degrees.

pdf-protect.label: Protect PDF
pdf-protect.description: Add password protection and permission restrictions to a PDF.

pdf-unlock.label: Unlock PDF
pdf-unlock.description: Remove password protection from a PDF file.

pdf-page-numbers.label: Add Page Numbers
pdf-page-numbers.description: Add page numbers to every page of a PDF document.

pdf-watermark.label: PDF Watermark
pdf-watermark.description: Add a text watermark to every page of a PDF document.

pdf-extract-text.label: Extract Text from PDF
pdf-extract-text.description: Extract all text content from a PDF as plain text or JSON.

image-to-pdf.label: Image to PDF
image-to-pdf.description: Convert one or more images into a single PDF document.

audio-convert.label: Convert Audio
audio-convert.description: Convert audio files between formats with bitrate and sample rate control.

audio-trim.label: Trim Audio
audio-trim.description: Cut a segment from an audio file by selecting start time and duration.

fps.label: Frames per second
fps.description: Number of frames extracted per second. Lower values produce smaller files but choppier animation.

resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.description: Scale the output to a specific width. Height is adjusted automatically to keep the aspect ratio.

model.label: AI model
model.description: Fast is quicker but less precise. Quality gives better edges. ISNet is optimized for precise object segmentation.

refine_edges.label: Refine edges
refine_edges.description: Uses alpha matting to smooth edges and remove white halos. Slower but much better edge quality.

fg_threshold.label: Foreground threshold
fg_threshold.description: Pixels above this value are considered definite foreground. Higher values are more conservative (0-255).

bg_threshold.label: Background threshold
bg_threshold.description: Pixels below this value are considered definite background. Lower values are more conservative (0-255).

erode_size.label: Erode size
erode_size.description: How much to shrink the mask before refining. Larger values remove more edge artifacts but may trim the subject.

quality.label: Quality
quality.description: Higher values produce better quality but larger files.

resize.label: Resize width
resize.description: Scale the image to a specific width. Height is adjusted automatically to keep the aspect ratio.

codec.label: Codec
codec.description: H.264 is the most compatible. H.265 gives better compression. VP9 is great for web. ProRes is for pro video editing. Copy skips re-encoding.

audio.label: Audio
audio.description: Keep or remove the audio track from the output video.

start.label: Start time (seconds)
start.description: The second in the video where the GIF clip begins.

duration.label: Duration (seconds)
duration.description: How many seconds of video to convert into a GIF. Longer durations produce larger files.

strip_metadata.label: Strip metadata
strip_metadata.description: Remove EXIF data, camera info, and other metadata from the image. Reduces file size slightly.

bitrate.label: Bitrate
bitrate.description: Higher bitrate means better audio quality but larger file size.

text.label: Watermark text
text.description: The text to display as a watermark.

size.label: Font size
size.description: Size of the watermark text relative to the image width (percentage).

opacity.label: Opacity
opacity.description: Transparency of the watermark. Lower values make it more subtle.

dpi.label: DPI
dpi.description: Dots per inch. Higher DPI produces sharper images but larger file sizes.

time.label: Time (seconds)
time.description: The exact second in the video to capture as a thumbnail.

password.label: Password
password.description: Password to protect or unlock the PDF.

permissions.label: Permissions
permissions.description: What actions are allowed on the protected PDF.

start_number.label: Start number
start_number.description: The number to start counting from.

font_size.label: Font size
font_size.description: Size of the text in points.

page_size.label: Page size
page_size.description: The paper size for the output PDF.

margin.label: Margin (mm)
margin.description: Space around the image on each page in millimeters.

sample_rate.label: Sample rate
sample_rate.description: Audio sample rate in Hz. Higher values preserve more detail.
